content.en: Hyperspectral image denoising: Researchers have developed various algorithms to denoise and restore hyperspectral images. These algorithms use techniques such as low-rank tensor recovery, total variation regularization, nonlocal low-rank approximation, and tensor decomposition. The proposed methods have been found to effectively remove different types of noise and outperform existing denoising algorithms, providing better image quality and preserving structural information.
content.da: Hyperspektral billedafstøjning: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at afstøje og gendanne hyperspektrale billeder. Disse algoritmer anvender teknikker såsom lav-rang tensor gendannelse, total variation regulering, ikke-lokal lav-rang approksimation og tensor dekomposition. De foreslåede metoder har vist sig at kunne fjerne forskellige typer støj effektivt og overgå eksisterende afstøjningsalgoritmer, hvilket giver bedre billedkvalitet og bevarer strukturel information.
